SELECT
uploadResultTime AS time, devName AS equip, SC_PART AS part, SC_CONTENT AS spot, ID as id, RESULT AS value, ( CASE WHEN ALTPID = 1 THEN "二级" WHEN ALTPID = 2 THEN "一级" END ) level, (CASE WHEN alarm_flag="N" THEN '未处理' WHEN alarm_flag="Y" THEN '已处理' END) flag, std_value AS standard FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE ( (devName="1#TT-80陶瓷过滤机") OR (DEPT_NAME="电仪工段" AND (devName='1号过滤搅拌电机' OR devName='1号过滤主轴电机'))) AND (ALTPID = 1 OR ALTPID = 2) -- and alarm_flag='N' AND date(TASKSTART_TM) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ORDER BY uploadResultTime DESC;
